articles.description: Nicky Clarke, 63, added in a GB News interview today that the business set a high standard and his Mayfair salon was not able to continue at that level after the pandemic.
articles.content:

articles.title: Ten Percent review – a perfectly pleasant if pointless remake of Call My Agent! - The Guardian
articles.description: Stars from Helena Bonham Carter to Himesh Patel pitch up in this British twist on the showbiz drama, though they can’t all make fun of themselves. Still, you’ll plough through it with gusto – especially if you’ve not seen the original
